body_content.explanation: not connected with the natural processes of living things:
examples: The fluid contains a combination of nonbiological materials.
One research group has produced similar crystals using non-biological techniques.
In some cases, courts will award custody of children to nonbiological parents.
She still has a good relationship with her non-biological daughter.

body_content.explanation: Nonbiological washing powder or liquid does not use enzymes (= substances that cause chemical change) to remove dirt:
examples: This mild, nonbiological washing powderlaundry detergent is made from natural ingredients.
Using a non-biological washing powder can help to reduce itchiness.
